item.title: SWN
item.description: score:48 Chances: Southwestern Energy Co. is engaged in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas, oil, and NGLs. The company operates in northeast Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and southwest Pennsylvania, with a focus on natural gas, oil, and NGLs production. The renewable energy industry is worth a close inspection, and despite recent downturns, optimism prevails with wind and solar energy costs dipping to low levels.
